ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering and raising skill level
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh What that means is the same for all trade skills (Spent 300pp in Fletching no raise).  With the advent of the get item back in some trade skills and the
ygData.messageBody:
Heh What that means is the same for all trade skills (Spent 300pp in
Fletching no raise). With the advent of the "get item back" in some trade
skills and the 5 arrows it is now MUCH MUCH harder to advance than it was
before. Personally I would rather lose a pie tine or sharpening stone then
take over 100pp to advance IMHO.


<-- Enigma -->
Follower of the Crimson Knights
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Focus [mailto:focus@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 3:20 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Tinkering and raising skill level

From: Focus <focus@...>

I also spent over 100PP without a single point advance. The GM I petitioned
said it
had recently come to their attention and was being addressed... whatever
that means.
Until it's fixed Tinkering is pretty useless. I'd love to make some of the
harder
items but don't really have 1000's of plat to throw around.

Focasa

22 Wizard
Fennin Ro
